title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and select Zip File to export
4. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier, give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip'), and begin export to zip file.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file by following the steps above, an error message box pops up. The error message states that problems were encountered during the export, and specifically lists the file with the same name in 'project2' as the problem.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files, regardless of the files having the same name but being located in different directories.
SR: Follow the steps mentioned in the description to reproduce the issue.
